feedback_text: Need ability to bulk edit shifts when we have menu changes. Takes 2 hours to manually update everyone's schedule
Tip pooling calculation doesn't match our house policy. We split tips 60/40 between FOH/BOH but the system only does even splits
Love the mobile shift swaps! Our team uses it constantly. Reduced our no-shows by 30%
Labor cost % reporting is delayed by 24 hours. Need real-time visibility when we're approaching overtime thresholds
Can't copy a schedule template across multiple locations. Have to rebuild the same schedule 8 times for our franchise
Auto-calculated breaks aren't accounting for our state's meal break laws. California requires 30min unpaid after 5 hours
Tip reporting for tax purposes is straightforward. CPA loves the exported reports
Shift marketplace feature is a game changer. Staff can pick up shifts without manager approval within our rules
Need integration with our POS (Toast) to pull actual sales data for labor forecasting. Current manual entry is error-prone
Payroll export to ADP works but requires too many manual steps. Should be one-click
The AI scheduling suggestions are awful. Scheduled our best closer for morning prep shift
Credit card tip distribution timing is confusing. Staff don't understand when tips hit their paycheck vs cash same-day
Overtime alerts come too late. By the time I see the notification we're already 2 hours over budget
Mobile app is way better than our old scheduling board. Staff actually check their schedules now
Minimum wage rate changes aren't automatic by jurisdiction. Had to manually update 47 employee records when city raised wages
Tip pooling by position works great but need ability to exclude managers from the pool automatically per FLSA rules
Availability management is clunky. Staff can't set recurring unavailability like every Tuesday for school
Need forecasted vs actual labor cost comparison in real-time. Currently can only see this in weekly reports
Integration with Gusto payroll is seamless. Saves us 4 hours every pay period
Shift notes feature is perfect for communicating prep tasks. Much better than our old whiteboard system
Cash tip tracking is manual. Need ability for staff to log cash tips in the app for accurate reporting
Break compliance tracking is great but alerts should go to managers not just admin. Need role-based notifications
Tip credit calculation is wrong for tipped employees. System doesn't account for our state's tip credit rate of $5.12
Open shift posting works but need ability to limit who can claim based on certifications. Only ServeState certified can bartend
Labor forecasting based on sales is inaccurate for our business. We're event-based not consistent traffic
Auto tip-out to support staff (bussers, runners) based on sales is exactly what we needed. No more manual calculations
Time off requests get lost. Need better visibility into pending requests and ability to bulk approve
Payroll summary reports don't include our custom earning codes for uniform reimbursement and mileage
Real-time labor dashboard on the KDS screen is brilliant. Chef can see we're over on labor and cut people early
Schedule publishing is too manual. Want automatic publish 2 weeks out so staff always have visibility
Tip pooling transparency for staff is great. They can see exactly how the pool was calculated each shift
Need better overtime prediction. System should warn me when I'm scheduling someone into OT before I publish
Sales forecasting integration with our reservation system (OpenTable) would make labor scheduling so much better
Shift reminders via text are reducing our no-call-no-shows significantly. Best feature we've added
Declared tips vs credit card tips reconciliation is confusing in the reports. Need clearer breakdown
Multi-location payroll consolidation doesn't work. Have to run separate payroll for each of our 5 locations
Historical labor data exports are limited to 90 days. Need full year for our annual planning
Drag and drop scheduling is intuitive. Onboarded our new AGM in 15 minutes
Service charge distribution rules are too rigid. We have different service charge rates for private events vs regular service
Predictive scheduling compliance features are ahead of the curve. Helps us stay compliant with new SF ordinances
